title: fix: increase zIndex in PCBViewer for improved overlay handling
description: Increase the zIndex of the "Click to Interact" overlay in the PCBViewer component to improve its handling of overlays.

title: jumper props
description: Adds new properties (`pinCount` and `internallyConnectedPins`) to the `jumperProps` type to support 2-pin and 3-pin jumpers with different internal pin connections.

title: introduced solderjumper footprint
description: Introduced a new footprint for a "solderjumper" component.

title: fixed soic8 and tssop8
description: Fixed the 3D models for SOIC8 and TSSOP8 footprints.

title: Only display pin1 indicator for chips, now as a filled up triangle instead of a notch
description: Change the pin1 indicator to be a filled up triangle instead of a notch.

title: fixed rotated_rect not supported bug
description: Fixes a bug where "rotated_rect" shape is not supported in the Gerber aperture definition.

title: feat(gerber): add support for pill shape in gerber aperture generation
description: Add support for pill-shaped elements in the Gerber aperture generation process.

title: Switch from `/snippets/list_latest` to `/packages/list_latest`
description: Switch the API endpoint from `/snippets/list_latest` to `/packages/list_latest` to only return non-snippet packages.

title: Missed type error, getting the correct response for the packages
description: Fixes a type error in the code that was returning the wrong data for the packages.

title: refactor: replacing `/snippets/list` -> `/packages/list`
description: Refactor: replacing `/snippets/list` with `/packages/list`

title: feat: append  mainComponentPath for custom component runs
description: Adds support for custom component paths in the runframe package.

title: feat: add PackageCard component and update trending page to use packages
description: This pull request introduces the new PackageCard component to display package information and updates the trending page to use packages instead of snippets.

title: refactor: simplify package file updates in CodeAndPreview component
description: Refactors the `CodeAndPreview` component to simplify the logic for updating package files.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the version of the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency.

title: feat(CodeEditor): add state to track editor readiness
description: Introduce `isCodeEditorReady` state to manage editor opacity based on its readiness, improving user experience.

title: fix(CodeEditor): support react syntax for old .ts packages
description: Ensure that .ts files are correctly processed by replacing the extension with .tsx in the tsFacet configuration.

title: chore: runframe (Send shipping carrier to stripe)
description: Update the @tscircuit/runframe dependency to version 0.0.415

title: add fake for `/packages/list_trending`
description: Add a fake for the `/packages/list_trending` endpoint

title: chore: update circuit-json-to-gerber dependency to v0.0.18
description: Updates the `circuit-json-to-gerber` dependency to version 0.0.18.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the version of the "@tscircuit/runframe" dependency from 0.0.403 to 0.0.412.

title: test: add cleanup for web worker instances in test files
description: Ensures proper cleanup of web worker instances by adding `await worker.kill()` at the end of each test to prevent potential memory leaks and ensure tests run in a clean state.

title: ci: update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions
description: Update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions of `actions/checkout` and `oven-sh/setup-bun`.

title: fix: runtime cost undefined error
description: Fixes a runtime error related to the `orderQuote.shipping_options` property being undefined.

title: Show breakdown of the total cost from the order_quote
description: This pull request adds a breakdown of the total cost from the order quote, including the lowest shipping carrier cost and the original total cost without shipping.

title: Send the shipping carrier information to stripe
description: Send the shipping carrier information to stripe

title: edge case cover to show the loading state
description: Add edge case cover to show the loading state when fetching quotes

title: fix: `No quote available` error by simplifying this logic
description: Simplify the logic for handling errors and loading states in the `InitialOrder` component.

title: update the order-quote dialog
description: Update the UI and formatting of the order-quote dialog.

title: feat(cli): enhance package search with interactive selection and installation
description: Enhance package search with interactive selection and installation

title: feat(cli): add search command to CLI for querying snippets
description: Add a search command to the CLI for querying snippets

title: High Density Intra Node Solvers incorporate connMap (causes overlaid vias w/ same-net, but improves completion)
description: The pull request introduces changes to the High Density Intra Node Solvers to incorporate connMap, which causes overlaid vias with the same net but improves completion.

title: Path Optimization Schedule for MultiSectionPathing Solver, improve section visualization
description: Introduces a JSON file with detailed information about a capacity mesh node (cn27815) and its port points, including their coordinates and connection names.

title: New Autorouting Pipeline Debugger header to allow configuring cache
description: Adds a new Autorouting Pipeline Debugger header to allow configuring the cache provider, including options for In Memory, Local Storage, and None.
